meanings.definition: A list of people or things that one dislikes or is angry with.
meanings.sent1: I added my annoying neighbor to my shitlist.
meanings.sent2: Her shitlist included all the rude customers she encountered at work.
meanings.sent3: My cat seems to have her own little shitlist of birds that bother her.
meanings.sent4: After the argument, he mentally added his friend to his shitlist.
meanings.sent5: She kept her shitlist hidden in a drawer, filled with names of people who had wronged her.

meanings.definition: To put someone on a list of people or things that one dislikes or is angry with.
meanings.sent1: I will shitlist anyone who betrays my trust.
meanings.sent2: She decided to shitlist the company that scammed her.
meanings.sent3: He jokingly threatened to shitlist anyone who ate the last cookie.
meanings.sent4: The teacher warned the students not to shitlist their classmates over small disagreements.
meanings.sent5: She felt relieved after finally shitlisting her toxic ex-boyfriend from her life.
